whatIsHelpsta.question: What is Helpsta?
whatIsHelpsta.answer: Helpsta is a revolutionary mobile platform that transforms the way you interact with mobile technology. We connect users with local businesses through our reward system and community features, making your daily mobile experience more rewarding and engaging.

howToDownload.question: How do I download the Helpsta app?
howToDownload.answer: You can download the Helpsta app from the App Store for iOS devices or Google Play Store for Android devices. Simply search for 'Helpsta' and look for our official app with the orange logo. The app is free to download and use.

rewardPartners.question: What are Reward Partners?
rewardPartners.answer: Reward Partners are local businesses that have joined our network to offer exclusive deals, discounts, and rewards to Helpsta users. When you visit or shop at these partner locations, you can earn rewards and enjoy special offers that are only available through our platform.

becomePartner.question: How can my business become a Reward Partner?
becomePartner.answer: Becoming a Reward Partner is easy! Visit our 'Become a Partner' page and fill out the application form. Our team will review your application within 2-3 days, and once approved, you'll get access to our partner dashboard where you can manage your offers and track your performance.

dataSecurity.question: How secure is my personal data?
dataSecurity.answer: We take data security very seriously. All personal information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal data with third parties without your explicit consent. You can review our detailed privacy policy for more information about how we protect and handle your data.

support.question: How can I get help or support?
support.answer: Our support team is available to help you through multiple channels. You can contact us via email at hello@helpsta.com, visit our Help Center for self-service options, or use the in-app support feature. We typically respond to inquiries within 24 hours.

hero.title: About Helpsta
hero.subtitle: Revolutionizing mobile experiences for millions worldwide
hero.description: We're a passionate team dedicated to transforming how people interact with mobile technology, creating meaningful connections between users and local businesses.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2019, Helpsta began with a simple vision: to bridge the gap between mobile technology and local communities. What started as a small team with big dreams has grown into a revolutionary platform that connects millions of users with thousands of businesses worldwide.
story.paragraph2: Our journey started when we noticed the disconnect between digital innovation and local community engagement. We saw an opportunity to create something meaningful - a platform that not only provides cutting-edge mobile experiences but also strengthens local economies and builds genuine connections.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to be at the forefront of mobile innovation, continuously pushing boundaries while staying true to our core mission of creating value for both users and local businesses.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To revolutionize mobile experiences by creating meaningful connections between users and local businesses, fostering community growth and digital innovation.

vision.title: Our Vision

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use Helpsta.

sections.dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
sections.dataCollection.content:
We collect information you provide directly to us:

  • Account Information: Name, email address, phone number
  • Profile Information: Profile picture, preferences, location
  • Usage Data: App interactions, feature usage, device information
  • Location Data: GPS coordinates (with your permission) to find nearby partners
  • Communication Data: Messages you send through our platform

We also automatically collect certain information through cookies and similar technologies when you use our website or mobile app.
sections.dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.dataUsage.content:
We use your information to:

  • Provide and improve our services
  • Connect you with nearby reward partners
  • Process rewards and transactions
  • Send you important updates and communications
  • Personalize your experience
  • Analyze usage patterns to improve our platform
  • Ensure security and prevent fraud
  • Comply with legal obligations

We will not use your personal information for purposes other than those described in this policy without your consent.
sections.dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
sections.dataSharing.content:
We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

  • With Business Partners: Limited information to facilitate rewards and services
  • Service Providers: Third-party companies that help us operate our platform
  • Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
  • Business Transfers: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or sales
  • With Your Consent: When you explicitly agree to sharing

All third parties are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information and use it only for specified purposes.
sections.dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Retention
sections.dataStorage.content:
Your information is stored securely on servers located in Germany and the European Union. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data.

We retain your information for as long as necessary to:

  • Provide our services to you
  • Comply with legal obligations
  • Resolve disputes and enforce agreements
  • Maintain security and prevent fraud

You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time, subject to legal retention requirements.
sections.userRights.title: Your Rights
sections.userRights.content:
Under GDPR and other applicable laws, you have the right to:

  • Access: Request copies of your personal data
  • Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
  • Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data
  • Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
  • Restriction: Limit how we process your information
  • Objection: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
  • Withdraw Consent: Revoke consent for data processing

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@helpsta.com
sections.cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
sections.cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies to:

  • Remember your preferences and settings
  • Analyze how you use our platform
  • Provide personalized content and advertisements
  • Improve our services and user experience

Types of cookies we use:

  • Essential Cookies: Required for basic functionality
  • Performance Cookies: Help us understand how users interact with our site
  • Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences and choices
  • Marketing Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements

You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie management tool.
sections.security.title: Data Security
sections.security.content:
We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your information:

  • End-to-end encryption for sensitive data
  • Secure data transmission protocols (SSL/TLS)
  • Regular security audits and assessments
  • Access controls and employee training
  • Incident response procedures
  • Regular software updates and patches

While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We encourage you to use strong passwords and keep your account credentials confidential.
sections.contact.title: Contact Us About Privacy
sections.contact.content:
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact our Data Protection Officer:

  • Email: privacy@helpsta.com
  • Address: Musterstraße 123, 10115 Berlin, Germany
  • Phone: +49 123 456 7890

We will respond to your privacy-related inquiries within 30 days.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.description: As a company operating in the European Union, we are committed to full compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This includes implementing privacy by design principles and ensuring your rights are protected at all times.
